V04prmosulu:2_1: buddhena lokārthacareṇa tāyinā sudeśitaṃ prātimokṣaṃ vidunā // 1 //
V04prmosulu:2_2: taṃ prātimokṣaṃ bhavaduḥkhamokṣaṃ śrutvāna dhīrāḥ sugatasya bhāṣitaṃ /
V04prmosulu:2_4: cirasya labdhvā ratanāni trīṇi buddhotpādaṃ mānuṣikāñ ca śraddhāṃ /
V04prmosulu:2_6: śīlena yukto śramaṇo 'tiveti śīlena yukto brāhmaṇo 'tiveti /
V04prmosulu:2_7: śīlena yukto naradevapūjyo śīlena yuktasya hi prātimokṣaṃ // 4 //
V04prmosulu:2_8: anekabuddhānumataṃ viśuddhaṃ śīlaṃ pratiṣṭhā dharaṇīva sānuṃ /
V04prmosulu:2_9: udāhariṣyāmy ahaṃ saṃghamadhye hitāya lokasya sadevakasya // 5 //
V04prmosulu:4_1: pracchādayanti hṛdayaṃ gaganam iva samunnatā meghāḥ //
V04prmosulu:4_4: kiṃ poṣadhena teṣāṃ ye te sāvadyaśīlacaritrāḥ /
V04prmosulu:4_6: kāryaṃ ca poṣadhena teṣāṃ ye te anavadyaśīlacāritrāḥ /
V04prmosulu:4_10: kāryaṃ ca poṣadhena teṣāṃ lajjinām abhinnavṛttaśīlānāṃ /
V04prmosulu:4_12: kiṃ poṣadhena teṣāṃ ye te duḥśīlapāpakarmāntāḥ /
V04prmosulu:4_13: kuṇapam iva samudrato samutkṣiptāḥ śāstu prāvacanāt //
V04prmosulu:4_14: kāryaṃ ca poṣadhena teṣāṃ ye te traidhātuke anupaliptāḥ /
V04prmosulu:4_16: kiṃ poṣadhena teṣāṃ ṣaḍindriyaṃ yehi yehi surakṣitaṃ nityaṃ /
V04prmosulu:4_18: kāryaṃ ca poṣadhena teṣāṃ ṣaḍindriyaṃ yehi surakṣitaṃ nityaṃ /
V04prmosulu:4_20: kiṃ poṣadhena teṣām ātmaśīlehi ye hy upavadanti /
V04prmosulu:4_21: sabrahmacāriṇaś ca śastā devamanuṣyāś ca duḥśīlāḥ //
V04prmosulu:4_22: kāryaṃ ca poṣadhena teṣāṃ śīlehi nāsti gārhyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:4_23: sarvatra nopavadyā vijñānāṃ vai sadevake loke // 16-17 //
V04prmosulu:4_24: kiṃ poṣadhena teṣāṃ virāgitaṃ śāstuḥ śāsanaṃ yehi /
V04prmosulu:4_25: āsevitā ca yehi vipattīyo pañca cāpattīḥ //
V04prmosulu:4_26: kāryaṃ ca poṣadhena teṣāṃ yuktānāṃ śāsane daśabalasya /
V04prmosulu:4_28: yeṣāṃ ca vasati hṛdaye śāstā dharmo gaṇottamo /
V04prmosulu:4_29: śikṣā uddeśo saṃvāso saṃbhogo śāstuno vacanaṃ //
V04prmosulu:4_31: paricarya dharmarājaṃ te yānti asaṃskṛtaṃ sthānaṃ // 20-21 //
V04prmosulu:4_32: śuddhasya vai sadā phalguḥ sadā śuddhasya poṣadho /
V04prmosulu:4_35: tāvat sthāsyati saddharmo sāmagrī ca gaṇottame // 23 //
V04prmosulu:4_36: yāvac ca deśayitāraḥ pratipattāraś ca dharmaratnasya /
V04prmosulu:4_38: tasmāt samagrāḥ sahitāḥ sagauravāḥ bhaviyā anyamanyaṃ paricaratha /
V04prmosulu:4_39: dharmarājam adhigacchatha nirvāṇam atandritā acyutam padam aśokam iti // 25 //
V04prmosulu:5_0: abhikrāntāḥ suvihitāḥ śuddhā nipuṇā anusaṅgāyanto upaniṣaṇṇā,
V04prmosulu:5_1: cāritāḥ śalākā, gaṇitā bhikḥū sīmāprāptā ettakā janāḥ /
V04prmosulu:5_3: ārocitaṃ ca prativedetha / ko bhikḥu bhikḥuṇīnāṃ cchandahārako? nāsti cātra kaścid anupasaṃpanno nāsti utkḥiptako /
V04prmosulu:5_4: nāsti mātṛghātī, nāsti pitṛghātī / nāsti arhantaghātako, nāsti saṃghabhedako, nāsti tathāgatasya duḥṭacittarudhirotpādako /
V04prmosulu:5_5_0: nāsti bhikḥuṇīdūḥako / nāsti stainyasaṃvāsiko, nāsti nānāsaṃvāsiko, nāsti asaṃvāsiko / nāsti tīrthikāpakrāntako / nāsti svayaṃsannaddhako /
V04prmosulu:5_5_1: tad evaṃ samanvāharantu bhagavato śrāvakāṇāṃ nityaviśuddhānāṃ pariśuddhaśīlānāṃ /
V04prmosulu:6_0: śṛṇotu me bhante saṃgho Ō adya saṃghasya cāturdaśiko vā sandhipoṣadho vā viśuddhinakṣatraṃ /
V04prmosulu:6_1: ettakaṃ ṛtusya nirgataṃ / etta[ka]m avaśiṣṭaṃ / kiṃ saṃghasya pūrvakṛtyaṃ? alpakṛtyo bhagavataḥ śrāvakasaṃgho so bhavati /
V04prmosulu:7_0: śṛṇotu me bhante saṃgho Ō adya saṃghasya pāñcadaśiko poṣadho viśuddhinakṣatraṃ /
V04prmosulu:7_1_0: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ saṃgho imasmin pṛthivīpradeśe yāvatakaṃ bhikṣusaṃghenābhigṛhītaṃ samantanavyāmamātraṃ atrāntare
V04prmosulu:7_1_1: pāñcadaśikaṃ poṣadhaṃ kuryāt prātimokṣaṃ ca sūtram uddiśeyyā /
V04prmosulu:8_0: kariṣyati bhante saṃgho imasmin pṛthivīpradeśe yāvatakaṃ bhikṣusaṃghenābhigṛhītaṃ samantanavyāmamātram atrāntare pāñcadaśikaṃ poṣadhaṃ prātimokṣaṃ ca sūtram uddiśiṣyati /
V04prmosulu:8_1: kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya, yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
V04prmosulu:9_4: girinadījalacapalacañcalopamā āyuḥ saṃskārā muhūrttam api nāvatiṣṭhante /
V04prmosulu:9_6: tat kasya hetoḥ? apramādādhigatānāṃ hi tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ bodhiḥ /
V04prmosulu:9_9: daśārthavaśān sampaśyamānās tathāgatārhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ śrāvakāṇām adhiśīlaṃ śikṣāpadaṃ prajñāpayanti,
V04prmosulu:9_11_0: katamān daśa? saṃyyathīdaṃ (1) saṃghasaṃgrahāya (2) saṃghasuṣṭhutāya (3) durmaṅkūnāṃ pudgalānāṃ nigrahāya (4) peśalānāṃ ca
V04prmosulu:9_11_1: bhikṣūṇāṃ phāsuvihārāya (5) aprasannānāṃ prasādāya (6) prasannānāṃ ca bhūyobhāvāya dṛṣṭadhārmikāṇām āśravāṇāṃ nirghātāya
V04prmosulu:9_11_2: (8) samparāyikāṇām āśravāṇām āyatyām ananuśravaṇatāya (9) yathemaṃ syāt prāvacanaṃ cirasthitikaṃ (10) bāhujanyaṃ vivṛtaṃ
V04prmosulu:9_12: imān daśārthavaśān saṃpaśyamānās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ śrāvakāṇām adhiśīlaṃ śikṣāpadaṃ prajñāpayanti prātimokṣaṃ ca sūtram uddiśanti /
V04prmosulu:10_1: taṃ śṛṇuta sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta /
V04prmosulu:10_4: tūṣṇīmbhāvena kho punar āyuṣmanto pariśuddhā iti vedayiṣyāmi /
V04prmosulu:10_5: yathā kho punar āyuṣmanto pratyekaṃ pratyekaṃ pṛcchitasya bhikṣusya vyākaraṇaṃ bhavati evam eva rūpāye bhikṣuparṣāye yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanuśrāvayiṣyati /
V04prmosulu:10_6: yo puna bhikṣu evaṃrūpāye bhikṣuparṣāye yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanuśrāviyamāṇo smaramāṇo santīm āpattiṃ nāviṣkaroti saṃprajānamṛṣāvādo se bhavati /
V04prmosulu:10_7: saṃprajānamṛṣāvādo kho punar āyuṣmanto āntarāyiko dharmo ukto bhagavatā /
V04prmosulu:10_8: tasmāt smaramāṇena bhikṣuṇā āpannena viśuddhiprekṣeṇa santī āpattī āviṣkartavyā /
V04prmosulu:13_0: ime kho punar āyuṣmanto catvāraḥ pārājikā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśam āgacchanti /
V04prmosulu:par.1_0_0: yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣūṇāṃ śikṣāsāmīcīsamāpanno śikṣām apratyākhyāya daurbalyam anāviṣkṛtvā maithunaṃ grāmyadharmaṃ pratiṣeveya
V04prmosulu:par.1_0_1: antamaśato tiryagyonigatāyam api sādham ayaṃ bhikṣuḥ pārājiko bhavaty asaṃvāsyo,
V04prmosulu:15_0: idaṃ bhagavatā veśālīyaṃ śikṣāpadaṃ prajñaptaṃ pañcavarṣābhisaṃbuddhena hemantapakṣe pañcame,
V04prmosulu:15_1: divase dvādaśame, purebhaktam uttarāmukhaniṣaṇṇena dvyardhapauruṣāyāṃ cchāyāyāṃ,
V04prmosulu:15_4: yathāpraṇihitasya ca yā anuvartanatā ayam ucyate anudharmo /
V04prmosulu:par.2_0_0: yo puna bhikṣu grāmād vā araṇyād vā adinnam anyātakaṃ stainasaṃskāram ādiyeya yathārūpeṇādinnādānena [rā]jāno gṛhītvā haneṃsu
V04prmosulu:par.2_0_1: vā bandheṃsu vā pravrājeṃsu vā hambho puruṣa coro 'si bālo 'si mūḍho 'si stainyo 'sīti vā vadeṃsu,
V04prmosulu:par.2_1: tathārūpaṃ bhikṣur adinnam ādiyamāno ayam pi bhikṣuḥ pārājiko bhavaty asaṃvāsyo,
V04prmosulu:17_0: idaṃ bhagavatā rājagṛhe śikṣāpadaṃ prajñaptaṃ ṣaḍvarṣābhisambuddhena hemantapakṣe dvitī[ye,
V04prmosulu:17_1_0: di]vase navame, paścādbhaktaṃ purastān mukhaniṣaṇṇena aḍḍhātīyapauruṣāyāṃ cchāyāyām āyuṣmantaṃ dhanikaṃ kumbhakārajātīyam
V04prmosulu:17_1_1: ārabhya rājānaṃ ca śreṇīyaṃ bimbasāraṃ pāṃsukūlikaṃ ca bhikṣaṃ /
V04prmosulu:17_2: imasya ca śikṣāpadasya prajñaptir dharmo yathāpraṇihitasya ca yā anuvartanatā ayam ucyate anudharmo /
V04prmosulu:par.3_0: yo puna bhikṣuḥ svahastaṃ manuṣyavigrahaṃ jīvitād vyaparopeya śastrahārakaṃ vāsya paryeṣeya,
V04prmosulu:par.3_1: maraṇāya cainaṃ samādāpeya, maraṇavarṇaṃ vāsya saṃvarṇeya Ō hambho puruṣa kiṃ te iminā pāpakena durjīvitena dhigjīvitena,
V04prmosulu:par.3_2: mṛtaṃ te jīvitāc chreyo Ō iti cittam alaṃ cittasaṃkalpam anekaparyāyeṇa maraṇāya vainaṃ samādāpeya maraṇavarṇaṃ vāsya saṃvarṇeya,
V04prmosulu:par.3_3: so ca puruṣo tenopakrameṇa kālaṃ kuryān nānyena,
V04prmosulu:par.3_4: ayaṃ pi bhikṣuḥ pārājiko bhavaty asaṃvāsyo,
V04prmosulu:19_0: idaṃ bhagavatā veśālīyaṃ śikṣāpadaṃ prajñaptaṃ ṣaḍvarṣābhisambuddhena hemantapakṣe tṛtīye,
V04prmosulu:19_1: divase daśame, paścādbhaktaṃ purastān mukhaniṣaṇṇena aḍḍhātīyapauruṣāyāṃ cchāyāyāṃ sambahulān gilānopasthāpakān bhikṣūn ārabhya mṛgadaṇḍikaṃ ca parivrājakaṃ /
V04prmosulu:19_3: yathāpraṇihitasya ca yā anuvartanatā ayam ucyate anudharmo /
V04prmosulu:par.4_0: yo puna bhikṣur anabhijānann aparijānann ātmopanāyikam uttarimanuṣyadharmam alamāryajñānadarśanaṃ viśeṣādhigamaṃ prātajāneya ita jānāmi ita paśyāmīti /
V04prmosulu:par.4_1: so tad apareṇa samayena samanugrāhiyamāṇo vā asa[ma]nugrāhiyamāṇo vā āpanno viśuddhiprekṣo evam avaci Ō ajānann evāham āyuṣmanto avaci jānāmi,
V04prmosulu:par.4_2: apaśyan paśyāmīti / iti tucchaṃ mṛṣā vilāpam anyatrābhimānāt* ayaṃ pi bhikṣuḥ pārājiko bhavaty asaṃvāsyo na labhate bhikṣūhi sārdhasaṃvāsaṃ /
V04prmosulu:21_0: idaṃ bhagavatā śrāvastīyaṃ śikṣāpadaṃ prajñaptaṃ ṣaḍvarṣābhisambuddhena hemantapakṣe caturthe,
V04prmosulu:21_1: divase trayodaśame, purebhaktaṃ uttarāmukhaniṣaṇṇena aḍḍhucchapauruṣāyāṃ cchāyāyāṃ saṃbahulān grāmavāsikān bhikṣūn ārabhya ābhiyānikaṃ ca bhikṣuṃ /
V04prmosulu:21_3: yathā praṇihitasya ca yā anuvartanatā ayam ucyate anudharmo /
V04prmosulu:22_1: (1) maithunam (2) adinnādānaṃ (3) vadho manuṣyavigrahasyā- (4) bhūtena cottarimanuṣyadharmaṃ pratijānātīti /
V04prmosulu:23_0: uddiṣṭāḥ kho punar āyuṣmanto catvāraḥ pārājikā dharmāḥ /
V04prmosulu:23_1: yeṣāṃ bhikṣur ito 'nyatarām āpattim āpadyitvā pārājiko bhavaty asaṃvāsyo na labhate bhikṣūhi sārdhasaṃvāsaṃ /
V04prmosulu:23_2_0: yathā pūrve tathā paścād yathā paścāt tathā pūrve pārājiko bhavaty asaṃvāsyo na labhate bhikṣūhi saṃvāsaṃ ḥ tatrāyuṣmanto
V04prmosulu:23_2_1: pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ? dvitīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ? tṛtīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha
V04prmosulu:23_2_2: pariśuddhāḥ? pariśuddhātrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi ḥ
V04prmosulu:25_0: ime kho punar āyuṣmanto trayodaśa saṃghātiśeṣā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśam āgacchanti /
V04prmosulu:sa.1_0: saṃcetanikāye śukrasya visṛṣṭīye anyatra svapnāntare saṃghātiśeṣo /
V04prmosulu:sa.2_0_0: yo puna bhikṣu otīrṇo vipariṇatena cittena mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdhaṃ kāyasaṃsargaṃ samāpadyeya saṃyathīdaṃ hastagrahaṇaṃ vā veṇīgrahaṇaṃ
V04prmosulu:sa.2_0_1: vā anyatarānyatarasya vā punar aṅgajātasya āmoṣaṇaparāmoṣaṇaṃ sādiyeya saṃghātiśeṣo /
V04prmosulu:sa.3_0: yo puna bhikṣu otīrṇo vipariṇatena cittena mātṛgrāmaṃ duṣṭhullāya vācāya obhāṣeya pāpikāya maithunopasaṃhitāya saṃyathīdaṃ yuvāṃ yuvatīti saṃghātiśeṣo /
V04prmosulu:sa.4_0_0: yo puna bhikṣu otīrṇo vipariṇatena cittena mātṛgrāmasya antike ātmikāye paricaryāye varṇaṃ bhāṣeya Ō etad agraṃ bhagini paricaryāṇāṃ
V04prmosulu:sa.4_0_1: yā mādṛśaṃ śramaṇaṃ śīlavantaṃ kalyāṇadharmaṃ brahmacāriṃ etena dharmeṇa upasthiheya paricareya yaduta maithunopasaṃhiteneti
V04prmosulu:sa.5_0_0: yo puna bhikṣuḥ saṃcaritraṃ samāpadyeya istriyāye mataṃ puruṣasyopasaṃhareya puruṣasya vā mataṃ istriyāye upasaṃhareya jāyattanena
V04prmosulu:sa.5_0_1: vā jārtanena vā antamaśato tatkṣaṇikāyām api saṃghātiśeṣo /
V04prmosulu:sa.6_0: svayaṃ yācikāya bhikṣuṇā kuṭī kārayamāṇena asvāmikātmoddeśikā kuṭī kārāpayitavyā /
V04prmosulu:sa.6_1: tatredaṃ pramāṇaṃ Ō dīrghaśo dvādaśa vitastīyo sugatavitastinā /
V04prmosulu:sa.6_4: anāraṃbhaṃ saparikramaṇaṃ / sāraṃbhe ced bhikṣu vastusminn aparikramaṇe svayaṃyācikāya kuṭīṃ kārāpeya asvāmikām ātmoddeśikāṃ bhikṣūn vā nābhineya vastudesanāya,
V04prmosulu:sa.6_5: pramāṇaṃ vā atikrameya, adeśite vastusminn aparikramaṇe saṃghātiśeṣo /
V04prmosulu:sa.7_0: mahālakaṃ bhikṣuṇā vihāraṃ [kārā]payamāṇena sasvāmikam ātmoddeśikaṃ bhikṣū cānenābhinetavyā vastudeśanāya /
V04prmosulu:sa.7_2: anāraṃbhaṃ saparikramaṇaṃ / sāraṃbhe ced bhikṣu vastusminn aparikramaṇe mahallakaṃ vihāraṃ kārāpeya sasvāmikam ātmoddeśikaṃ bhikṣūn vā nābhineya vastudeśanāya,
V04prmosulu:sa.8_1: doṣāt kupito, anāttamano śuddhaṃ bhikṣum anāpattikam amūlakena pārājikena dharmeṇa anudhvaṃseya apy evaṃ nāma imaṃ bhikṣuṃ brahmacaryāto cyāveyaṃ ti,
V04prmosulu:sa.8_2: so tad apareṇa samayena samanugrāhiyamāṇo vā asamanugrāhiyamāṇo vā amūlakam eva tam adhikaraṇaṃ bhavati /
V04prmosulu:sa.8_3: amūlakasya ca adhikaraṇasya ca adharmo upādinno bhavati,
V04prmosulu:sa.8_4: bhikṣu ca doṣe pratiṣṭhihati doṣād avacāmīti saṃghātiśeṣo /
V04prmosulu:sa.9_1_0: doṣāt kupito, anāttamano anyabhāgīyasyādhikaraṇasya kiñcid eva leśamātrakaṃ dharmam upādāya aparājikaṃ bhikṣuṃ pārājikena
V04prmosulu:sa.9_1_1: dharmeṇa anudhvaṃseya apy eva nāma imaṃ bhikṣuṃ brahmacaryāto cyāveyaṃ ti,
V04prmosulu:sa.9_2: so tad apareṇa samayena samanugrāhiyamāṇo vā asamanugrāhiyamāṇo vā anyabhāgīyam eva tam adhikaraṇaṃ bhavati,
V04prmosulu:sa.9_3: anyabhāgīyasya cādhikaraṇasya kocid e[va] leśamātrako dharmo upādinno bhavati,
V04prmosulu:sa.9_4: bhikṣu ca doṣe pratiṣṭhihati doṣād avacāmīti saṃghātiśeṣo /
V04prmosulu:sa.10_0: yo puna bhikṣuḥ samagrasya saṃghasya bhedāya parākrameya bhedanasaṃvartanīyaṃ vādhikaraṇaṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheya,
V04prmosulu:sa.10_1: so bhikṣu bhikṣūhi evam asya vacanīyo Ō mā āyuṣman samagrasya saṃghasya bhedāya parākramehi,
V04prmosulu:sa.10_2: bhedanasaṃvartanīyaṃ vā adhikaraṇaṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭhāhi /
V04prmosulu:sa.10_4: samagro hi saṃgho sahito sammodamāno avivadamāno ekuddeśo kṣīrodakībhūto śāstuḥ śāsanaṃ dīpayamāno sukhaṃ ca phāsuṃ ca viharati /
V04prmosulu:sa.10_5: evaṃ ca so bhikṣu bhikṣūhi vucyamāno taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ /
V04prmosulu:sa.10_6: no ca pratinissareya, so bhikṣu bhikṣūhi yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyo samanubhāṣitavyo tasya vastusya pratinissargāya /
V04prmosulu:sa.10_7: yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇo vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇo vā taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ /
V04prmosulu:sa.10_8: no ca pratinissareya tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheya saṃghātiśeṣo /
V04prmosulu:sa.11_0: tasya kho puna bhikṣusya bhikṣū sahāyakā bhonti eko vā,
V04prmosulu:sa.11_1: dvau vā trayo vā saṃbahulā vā,
V04prmosulu:sa.11_3: te bhikṣū tān bhikṣūn evaṃ vadeṃsu Ō mā āyuṣmanto etaṃ bhikṣuṃ kiñcid vadatha kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakaṃ vā /
V04prmosulu:sa.11_4: dharmavādī caiṣo bhikṣur vina[ya]vādī caiṣo bhikṣu,
V04prmosulu:sa.11_5: asmākaṃ caiṣo bhikṣu cchandaṃ ca ruciṃ ca samādāya pragṛhya vyavaharati /
V04prmosulu:sa.11_6: yaṃ caitasya bhikṣusya kṣamate ca rocate ca asmākam api taṃ kṣamate ca rocate ca /
V04prmosulu:sa.11_7: jānan caiṣo bhikṣu bhāṣate no ajānan /
V04prmosulu:sa.11_8: te bhikṣu bhikṣūhi evam asya vacanīyā Ō mā āyuṣmanto evaṃ vadatha,
V04prmosulu:sa.11_9: na eṣo bhikṣur dharmavādī, na eṣo bhikṣur vinayavādī, adharmavādī caiṣo bhikṣu, avinayavādī caiṣo bhikṣu, ajānan* caiṣo bhikṣu bhāṣate no jānan* /
V04prmosulu:sa.11_13: samagro hi sahito sammodamāno avivadamāno ekuddeśo kṣīrodakībhūto śāstuḥ śāsanaṃ dīpayamāno sukhaṃ ca phāsuṃ ca viharati /
V04prmosulu:sa.11_14: evaṃ ca te bhikṣū bhikṣūhi vucyamānās taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareṃsu ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ,
V04prmosulu:sa.11_15: no ca pratinissareṃsu te bhikṣū bhikṣūhi yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyāḥ samanubhāṣitavyāḥ tasya vastusya pratinissargāya /
V04prmosulu:sa.11_16: yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareṃsu i[ty e]taṃ kuśalaṃ,
V04prmosulu:sa.11_17: no ca pratinissareṃsu tam eva ca vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheṃsu saṃghātiśeṣo /
V04prmosulu:sa.12_1: so uddeśaparyāpannehi śikṣāpadehi bhikṣūhi śikṣāyāṃ saha dharmeṇa saha vinayena vucyamāno ātmānam avacanīyaṃ karoti /
V04prmosulu:sa.12_2: so evam āha Ō mā me āyuṣmanto kiñcid vadatha kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakaṃ vā /
V04prmosulu:sa.12_3: aham apy āyuṣmantānāṃ na kiñcid vakṣyāmi kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakaṃ vā /
V04prmosulu:sa.12_5: so bhikṣu bhikṣūhi evam asya vacanīyo Ō mā āyuṣmann uddeśaparyāpannehi śikṣāpadehi bhikṣūhi śikṣāyāṃ saha dharmeṇa saha vinayena vucyamāno ātmānam avacanīyaṃ karohi /
V04prmosulu:sa.12_7: bhikṣū pi āyuṣmantaṃ vakṣyanti śikṣāyāṃ saha dharmeṇa saha vina[yena] /
V04prmosulu:sa.12_8: āyuṣmān api bhikṣūn vadatu śikṣāyāṃ saha dharmeṇa saha vinayena /
V04prmosulu:sa.12_9: evaṃ saṃbaddhā kho punas tasya bhagavato tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksambuddhasya parṣā yad idam anyamanyasya vacanīyā,
V04prmosulu:sa.12_10: anyonyāpatti vyutthāpanīyā / evaṃ ca so bhikṣū bhikṣūhi vucyamāno taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ,
V04prmosulu:sa.12_11: no ca pratinissareya so bhikṣu bhikṣūhi yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyo samanubhāṣitavyo tasya vastusya pratinissargāya /
V04prmosulu:sa.12_12: yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇo vā taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ,
V04prmosulu:sa.12_13: no ca pratinissareya tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheya saṃghātiśeṣo /
V04prmosulu:sa.13_0: saṃbahulā bhikṣū kho punar anyataraṃ grāmam vā nagaraṃ vā nigamaṃ vā upaniśrāya viharanti kuladūṣakāḥ pāpasamācārāḥ /
V04prmosulu:sa.13_1: teṣāṃ te pāpakāḥ samācārā dṛśyante ca śrūyante ca /
V04prmosulu:sa.13_2: kulāny api duṣṭāni dṛśyante ca śrūyante ca /
V04prmosulu:sa.13_4: te bhikṣū bhikṣūhi evam asya vacanīyāḥ Ō āyuṣmantānāṃ khalu pāpakāḥ samācārāḥ dṛśyante ca śrūyante ca /
V04prmosulu:sa.13_5: kulāny api duṣṭāni dṛśyante ca śrūyante ca /
V04prmosulu:sa.13_7: prakramathāyuṣmanto imasmād āvāsād alaṃ vo iha vustena /
V04prmosulu:sa.13_8: evaṃ ca te bhikṣū bhikṣūhi vucyamānās te bhikṣū tān bhikṣūn evaṃ vadeṃsu Ō cchandagāmī cāyuṣmanto doṣagāmī cāyuṣmanto saṃgho,
V04prmosulu:sa.13_9: mohagāmī cāyuṣmanto saṃgho, bhayagāmī cāyuṣmanto saṃgho, saṃgho ca tāhi tādṛśikāhi āpattīhi ekatyān bhikṣūn pravrājeti ekatyān bhikṣūn na pravrājeti /
V04prmosulu:sa.13_10: te bhikṣū bhikṣūhi evam asya vacanīyāḥ Ō mā āyuṣmanto evaṃ vadatha /
V04prmosulu:sa.13_11: na saṃgho cchandagāmī, na saṃgho doṣagāmī, na saṃgho mohagāmī, na saṃgho bhayagāmī / na ca saṃgho tāhi tādṛśikāhi āpattīhi ekatyān bhikṣūn pravrājeti,
V04prmosulu:sa.13_13: āyuṣmantānām eva khalu pāpakāḥ samācārāḥ dṛśyante ca śrūyante ca /
V04prmosulu:sa.13_14: kulāny api duṣṭāni dṛśyante ca śrūyante ca /
V04prmosulu:sa.13_16: prakramathāyuṣmanto imasmād āvāsād alaṃ vo iha vustena /
V04prmosulu:sa.13_17: evaṃ ca te bhikṣū bhikṣūhi vucyamānā taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareṃsu ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ /
V04prmosulu:sa.13_18: no ca pratinissareṃsu te bhikṣū bhikṣūhi yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyās tasya vastusya pratinissargāya /
V04prmosulu:sa.13_19: yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ prati[ni]ssareṃsu ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ /
V04prmosulu:sa.13_20: no ca pratinissareṃsu tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheṃsu saṃghātiśeṣo /
V04prmosulu:39_1: (1) saṃcetanikā (2) hastagraho (3) obhāṣo (4) paricaryā atha (5) saṃcaritraṃ (6) kuṭīṃ (7) vihāro (8-9) dve cābhūtena (10) saṃghasya ca bhedāyopakrāmati /
V04prmosulu:40_0: uddiṣṭā kho punar āyuṣmanto trayodaśa saṃghātiśeṣā dharmāḥ /
V04prmosulu:40_2: yeṣāṃ bhikṣur ato 'nyatarām āpattim āpadyitvā yāvatakaṃ jānan* cchādeti tāvatakaṃ tena bhikṣuṇā akāmaparivāsaṃ parivasitavyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:40_3: parivustaparivāsena bhikṣuṇā uttariṣaḍāhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghe mānatvaṃ caritavyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:40_4: cīrṇamānatvo bhikṣuḥ kṛtānudharmo āhvayanapratibaddho yatra syād viṃśagaṇo bhikṣusaṃgho tatra so bhikṣu āhvayitavyo /
V04prmosulu:40_5: ekabhikṣuṇāpi ced ūnoviṃśatigaṇo bhikṣusaṃgho taṃ bhikṣum āhveya,
V04prmosulu:40_6: so ca bhikṣu anāhūto te ca bhikṣū garhyāḥ /
V04prmosulu:41_0_0: tatrāyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ? dvitīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ? tṛtīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto
V04prmosulu:41_0_1: pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ? pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
V04prmosulu:aniy.0_0: ime kho punar āyuṣmanto duve aniyatā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśam āgacchanti Ō
V04prmosulu:aniy.1_0: yo puna bhikṣu mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdhaṃ praticchannāsane alaṃkarmaṇīye eko [ekā]ya raho niṣadyāṃ kalpeya,
V04prmosulu:aniy.1_1: tam enaṃ śraddheyavacasā upāsikā dṛṣṭvā trayāṇāṃ dharmāṇām anyatarānyatareṇa dharmeṇa vadeya pārājikena vā saṃghātiśeṣeṇa vā pācattikena vā /
V04prmosulu:aniy.1_2_0: niṣadyāṃ bhikṣuḥ pratijānamāno trayāṇāṃ dharmāṇām anyatarānyatareṇa dharmeṇa kārāpayitavyo pārājikena vā saṃghātiśeṣeṇa vā
V04prmosulu:aniy.1_2_1: pācattikena vā yena yena vā punar asya śraddheyavacasā upāsikā dṛṣṭvā dharmeṇa vadeya,
V04prmosulu:aniy.2_0: na haiva kho punaḥ praticchannāsanaṃ bhavati,
V04prmosulu:aniy.2_1: nālaṃ karmaṇīyaṃ, alaṃ kho puna mātṛgrāmaṃ duṣṭhullāya vācāya obhāṣituṃ pāpikāya maithunopasaṃhitāya /
V04prmosulu:aniy.2_2: tathārūpe ca bhikṣu āsane mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdham eko ekāya raho niṣadyāṃ kalpeya,
V04prmosulu:aniy.2_3: tam enaṃ śraddheyavacasā upāsikā dṛṣṭvā dvinnāṃ dharmāṇām anyatarānyatareṇa dharmeṇa vadeya saṃghātiśeṣeṇa vā pācattikena vā /
V04prmosulu:aniy.2_4: niṣadyāṃ bhikṣuḥ pratijānamāno dvinnāṃ dharmāṇām anyatarāntareṇa dharmeṇa kārāpayitavyo saṃghātiśeṣeṇa vā pācattikena vā,
V04prmosulu:aniy.2_5: yena yena vā punar asya śraddheyavacasā upāsikā dṛṣṭvā dharmeṇa vadeya,
V04prmosulu:aniy.2_6: tena tena so bhikṣu dharmeṇa kārāpayitavyo /
V04prmosulu:47_0: uddiṣṭāḥ kho punar āyuṣmanto duve aniyatā dharmāḥ /
V04prmosulu:47_1_0: tatrāyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ? dvitīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhā? tṛtīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi
V04prmosulu:47_1_1: kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ? pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
V04prmosulu:49_0: ime kho punar āyuṣmanto triṃśan nissargikapācattikā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśam āgacchanti Ō
V04prmosulu:np.1_0: kṛtacīvarehi bhikṣūhi uddhṛtasmin kaṭhine daśāhaparamaṃ bhikṣuṇā atirekacīvaraṃ dhārayitavyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:np.2_0: kṛtacīvarehi bhikṣūhi uddhṛtasmin kaṭhine ekarātraṃ pi ced bhikṣuḥ trayāṇāṃ cīvarāṇām anyatarānyatareṇa vipravaseya anyatra saṃghasaṃmutīye,
V04prmosulu:np.3_0: kṛtacīvarehi bhikṣūhi uddhṛtasmin kaṭhine utpadyeya bhikṣusya akālacīvaram ākāṃkṣamāṇena bhikṣuṇā pratigṛhṇitavyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:np.3_1: pratigṛhṇitvā kṣipram eva taṃ cīvaraṃ kārāpayitavyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:np.3_2: kārāpayato ca tasya bhikṣusya taṃ cīvaraṃ na paripūreya,
V04prmosulu:np.3_3: māsaparamaṃ tena bhikṣuṇā taṃ cīvaraṃ nikṣipitavyaṃ ūnasya pāripūrīye santīye pratyāśāye /
V04prmosulu:np.3_4: taduttariṃ nikṣipeya santīye vā asantīye vā pratyāśāye nissargikapācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:np.4_0: yo puna bhikṣur anyātikāye bhikṣuṇīye cīvaraṃ pratigṛhṇeya anyatra pallaṭṭhakena nissargikapācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:np.5_0: yo puna bhikṣur anyātikāye bhikṣuṇīye purāṇacīvaraṃ dhovāpeya vā rañjāpeya vā ākoṭāpeya vā nissargikapācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:np.6_0: yo puna bhikṣur anyātakaṃ gṛhapatiṃ vā gṛhapatiputraṃ [?Śtipatinīṃ] vā cīvaraṃ yāceya anyatra samaye nissargikapācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:np.6_1: tatrāyaṃ samayo Ō ācchinnacīvaro bhikṣur bhavati /
V04prmosulu:np.7_0: ācchinnacīvareṇa bhikṣuṇā kṣamate anyātakaṃ gṛhapatiṃ vā gṛhapatiputrīṃ [Śtipatinīṃ] vā cīvaraṃ yācituṃ /
V04prmosulu:np.7_1: tam enam abhihṛṣṭo samāno saṃbahulehi cīvarehi pravāreya,
V04prmosulu:np.8_0_0: bhikṣuṃ kho punar uddiśya anyatareṣāṃ dvinnāṃ gṛhapatikānāṃ cīvaracetāpanāny abhisaṃskṛtāni bhavanti abhisaṃcetayitāni Ō
V04prmosulu:np.8_0_1: imehi vayaṃ cīvaracetāpanehi civaraṃ cetāpayitvā itthanāmaṃ bhikṣuṃ cīvareṇācchadayiṣyāmaḥ /
V04prmosulu:np.8_1_0: tatra ca bhikṣuḥ pūrvaṃ apravārito upasaṃkramitvā vikalpam āpadyeya Ō sādhu kho puna yūyam āyuṣmanto imehi cīvaracetāpanehi
V04prmosulu:np.8_2: evaṃrūpeṇa vā [evaṃrūpeṇa vā] ubhau pi sahitau ekena kalyāṇakāmatām upādāya /
V04prmosulu:np.9_0: bhikṣuṃ kho punar uddiśya anyatareṣāṃ dvinnāṃ gṛhapatikasya gṛhapatinīye ca pratyekacīvaracetāpanāni abhisaṃskṛtāni bhavanti,
V04prmosulu:np.9_1: abhisaṃcetayitāni Ō imehi vayaṃ pratyekacīvaracetāpanehi pratyekaṃ pratyekaṃ cīvaraṃ cetāpayitvā itthaṃnāmaṃ bhikṣuṃ pratyekaṃ pratyekaṃ cīvareṇācchadayiṣyāmaḥ /
V04prmosulu:np.9_2: tatra ca bhikṣuḥ pūrvaṃ apravārito upasaṃkramitvā vikalpam āpadyeya Ō sādhu kho punas tvam āyuṣman,
V04prmosulu:np.9_3_0: tvaṃ ca bhagini, imehi pratyekacīvaracetāpanehi pratyekaṃ cīvaraṃ cetāpayitvā itthaṃnāmaṃ bhikṣuṃ pratyekaṃ cīvareṇācchādetha
V04prmosulu:np.9_3_1: evaṃrūpeṇa vā evaṃrūpeṇa vā ubhau pi sahitau ekena kalyāṇakāmatām upādāya /
V04prmosulu:np.10_0: bhikṣuṃ kho punar uddiśya anyataro rājā vā rājabhogyo vā dūtena cīvaracetāpanāni preṣeya /
V04prmosulu:np.10_1: so bhikṣus tenopasaṃkramitvā taṃ bhikṣum evaṃ vadeya Ō imāni khalv āryam uddiśya itthaṃnāmena rājñā ca rājabhogyena vā dūtena cīvaracetāpanāni preṣitāni,
V04prmosulu:np.10_2: tāni āryo pratigṛhṇātu / tena bhikṣuṇā so dūto evam asya vacanīyo Ō na kho punar āyuṣman kṣamate bhikṣusya cīvaracetāpanāni pratigṛhṇituṃ /
V04prmosulu:np.10_3: cīvaraṃ tu vayaṃ pratigṛhṇāmaḥ kālena samayena kalpikaṃ dīyamānaṃ /
V04prmosulu:np.10_4: evam ukte so dūto taṃ bhikṣum evaṃ vadeya [sa]nti punar ārya kecid bhikṣūṇāṃ vaiyāpṛtyakarāti /
V04prmosulu:np.10_5: ākāṃkṣamāṇena bhikṣuṇā santā vaiyāpṛtyakarā vyapadiśitavyāḥ ārāmikā vā /
V04prmosulu:np.10_6: ete āyuṣman bhikṣūṇāṃ vaiyāpṛtyakarā ye bhikṣūṇāṃ vaiyāpṛtyaṃ karonti /
V04prmosulu:np.10_7_0: evam ukte so dūto yena vaiyāpṛtyakarās tenopasaṃkramitvā tān vaiyāpṛtyakarān evaṃ vadeya Ō sādhu kho puna yūyam āyuṣmanto
V04prmosulu:np.10_7_1: vaiyāpṛtyakarā imehi cīvaracetāpanehi cīvaraṃ cetāpayitvā itthaṃnāma bhikṣuṃ cīvareṇācchādetha kālena samayena kalpikenānavadyena /
V04prmosulu:np.10_8_0: so ca dūto tān vaiyāpṛtyakarān saṃjñapayitvā yena so bhikṣus tenopasaṃkramitvā na bhikṣum eva vadeya ye khu te āryeṇa vaiyāpṛtyakarā
V04prmosulu:np.10_8_1: vyapadiṣṭās te mayā saṃjñaptās tān upasaṃkrameyāmi /
V04prmosulu:np.10_9: ācchādayiṣyanti te cīvareṇa kālena samayena kalpikenānavadyena /
V04prmosulu:np.10_10_0: ākāṃkṣamāṇena bhikṣuṇā cīvarārthikena [yena] te vaiyāpṛtyakarās tenopasaṃkramitvā te vaiyāpṛtyakarāḥ sakṛt* dvikkhutto trikkhutto
V04prmosulu:np.10_10_1: codayitavyā vijñāpayitavyāḥ Ō artho āyuṣmanto bhikṣusya cīvareṇeti /
V04prmosulu:np.10_11: sakṛt* dvikkhutto trikkhutto codayanto vijñāpayanto taṃ cīvaram abhiniṣpādeya ity etat kuśalaṃ,
V04prmosulu:np.10_12: no ced abhiniṣpādeya catukkhutto pañcakhutto ṣaṭkhuttoparamaṃ tena bhikṣuṇā tūṣṇībhūtena uddeśe sthātavyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:np.10_13: catukkhutto pañcakkhutto ṣaṭkkhuttoparamaṃ tūṣṇībhūto uddeśe tiṣṭhanto taṃ cīvaram abhiniṣpādeya,
V04prmosulu:np.10_14: ity etat kuśalaṃ, no ced abhiniṣpādeya tad uttapanto vā vyāyamanto vā taṃ cīvaram abhiniṣpādeya,
V04prmosulu:np.10_16: no ced abhiniṣpādeya yena se tāni rājñā vā rājabhogyena vā dūtena cīvaracetāpanāni preṣitāni tatra tena bhikṣuṇā svayaṃ vā gantavyaṃ,
V04prmosulu:np.10_18: yāni khu āyuṣmantehi itthaṃnāmaṃ bhikṣum uddiśya dūtena cīvaracetāpanāni preṣitāni na khu tāni tasya bhikṣusya kiñcid arthaṃ spharanti,

V04prmosulu:np.11_0: yo puna bhikṣuḥ śuddhakālakānām eḍakalomānāṃ navaṃ santhataṃ kārāpeya nissargikapācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:np.12_0: navaṃ santhataṃ bhikṣuṇā kārāpayamāṇena śuddhakālakānām eḍakalomānāṃ dve bhāgā ādayitavyās tṛtīyo odātikānāṃ caturtho gocarikāṇāṃ /
V04prmosulu:np.13_0: yo puna bhikṣuḥ kauśeyamiśrāṇām eḍakalomānāṃ navaṃ santhataṃ kārāpeya nissargikapācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:np.14_0: navaṃ santhataṃ bhikṣuṇā kārāpayamāṇena akāmaṃ ṣaḍvarṣāṇi dhārayitavyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:np.14_1: tato ca bhikṣuḥ pratyoreṇa taṃ purāṇaṃ santhataṃ visarjayitvā vā avisarjayitvā vā anyaṃ navaṃ santhataṃ kārāpeya kalyāṇakāmatām upādāya,
V04prmosulu:np.15_0: navaṃ santhataniṣīdanaṃ bhikṣuṇā kārāpayamāṇena tato purāṇasanthatāto samantāt sugatavitastinā bhāgo ādayitavyo navasya durvaṇṇīkaraṇārthaṃ /
V04prmosulu:np.15_1: tato ca bhikṣur anādāya navasanthataṃ niṣīdanaṃ kārāpeya nissargikapācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:np.16_0: bhikṣusya kho punar adhvānamārge pratipannasya utpadyeṃsu e[ḍa]kalomāni /
V04prmosulu:np.16_2: pratigṛhṇitvā sāmaṃ triyojanaparamaṃ hartavyam asante anyasmi[n] hārake taduttariṃ hāreya sante vā asante vā anyasmi[n] hārake,
V04prmosulu:np.17_0: yo puna bhikṣur anyātikāye bhikṣuṇīye eḍakalomādi dhovāpeya vā raṃjāpe[ya] vā vivaṭāpaye vā,
V04prmosulu:np.18_0: yo puna bhikṣuḥ svahastaṃ jātarūparajatam udgṛhṇeya vā udgṛhṇāpeya vā antamasato iha nikṣipehīti vā vadeya,
V04prmosulu:np.19_0: yo puna bhikṣur anekavidhaṃ krayavikrayavyavahāraṃ samāpadyeya saṃyyathīdaṃ imaṃ kriṇa ito kriṇa ettakamettake[na krī]ṇāhīti vā vadeya,
V04prmosulu:np.20_0: yo puna bhikṣur anekavidhaṃ jātarūparajatavikṛtivyavahāraṃ samāpadyeya nissargikapācattikam //
V04prmosulu:71_1: (11) śuddhakālakānāṃ (12) dve bhāgā (13) kauśeyamiśra (14) ṣaḍvarṣāṇi (15) niṣīdanaṃ (16) adhvānamārgo (17) vivaṭā vā (18) svahastaṃ (19) krayavikraya (20) vikṛtivyavahāreṇa /

V04prmosulu:np.22_0: yo puna bhikṣu ūnapañcabandhanabaddhena pātreṇa anyaṃ navaṃ pātraṃ paryeṣeya kāmātām upādāya,
V04prmosulu:np.22_1: tena bhikṣuṇā taṃ pātraṃ bhikṣuparṣāye nissaritavyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:np.22_2: yo tahi bhikṣuparṣāye pātraparyanto bhavati so tasya bhikṣusya anupradātavyo Ō evaṃ te āyuṣman pātro dhārayitavyo yāvad bhedanaṃ,
V04prmosulu:np.23_0: yāni kho punar imāni gilānapratiṣevaṇīyāni bhaiṣajyāni bhavanti sayyathīdaṃ sarpistailamadhuphāṇitaṃ Ō evaṃrūpāṇi gilānena bhikṣuṇā satkṛtyābhigṛhītāni,
V04prmosulu:np.23_3: taduttariṃ khādeya vā bhuṃjeya vā santaṃ vā śeṣabhū[taṃ] nissareya nissargikapācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:np.24_0: yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣusya cīvaraṃ datvā yathā duṣṭo doṣāt kupito anāttamāno ācchindeya vā ācchindāpayeya vā Ō āhara bhikṣu cīvaraṃ,
V04prmosulu:np.25_0: māso śeṣo grīṣmāṇām iti bhikṣuṇā varṣāsāṭikācīvaraṃ paryeṣitavyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:np.25_2: tato ca bhikṣuḥ pra[tyo]reṇa varṣāsāṭikācīvaraṃ paryeṣeya,
V04prmosulu:np.26_0: yo puna bhikṣuḥ svayaṃyācikāya sūtraṃ tantuvāyena cīvaraṃ vunāpeya nissargikapācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:np.27_0: bhikṣuṃ kho punar uddiśya anyataro gṛhapatir vā gṛhapatiputro vā tantuvāyena cīvaraṃ vunāpeya,
V04prmosulu:np.27_1: tena ca bhikṣuḥ pūrvaṃ apravārito upasaṃkramitvā vikalpam āpadyeya Ō sādhu kho punas tvam āyuṣmann imaṃ cīvaram āyataṃ ca karohi,
V04prmosulu:np.27_2: vistṛtaṃ ca karohi, suvutaṃ ca karohi, sutacchitaṃ ca karohi, suvilikhitaṃ ca karohi / apy eva nāma vayaṃ pi tava kiñcid eva mātrām upasaṃharema,
V04prmosulu:np.27_3: māṣakaṃ vā māṣakārhaṃ vā piṇḍapātaṃ vā piṇḍapātārhaṃ vā /
V04prmosulu:np.27_4: tatra ca so bhikṣur evaṃ vaditvā na kiñcid eva mātrām upasaṃhareya māṣakaṃ vā māṣakārhaṃ vā piṇḍapātaṃ vā piṇḍapātārhaṃ vā,
V04prmosulu:np.28_0: daśāhānāgataṃ kho puna tremāsaṃ kārttikī paurṇamāsī utpadyeya bhikṣusya ātyāyikaṃ cīvaram ātyāyikaṃ manyamāno na bhikṣuṇā pratigṛhṇitavyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:np.29_0: upavarṣaṃ kho punaḥ tremāsaṃ kārttikī paurṇamāsī bhikṣu cāraṇyake śayanāsane viharanti samaye sapratibhaye sāśaṃkasaṃmate /
V04prmosulu:np.29_1: ākāṃkṣamāṇena bhikṣuṇā trayāṇāṃ cīvarāṇām anyatarānyataraṃ cīvaram antaragṛhe nikṣipitavyaṃ,
V04prmosulu:np.29_2: syāt tasya bhikṣusya kocid eva pratyayo tasmāc cīvarād vipravāsāya,
V04prmosulu:np.29_3: ṣaḍāhaparamaṃ tena bhikṣuṇā tasmāc cīvarād vipravasitavyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:np.29_4: taduttariṃ vipravaseya anyatra bhikṣu saṃmutīye nissargikapācattikam /
V04prmosulu:np.30_0: yo puna bhikṣur jānan sāṃghikāṃ lābhaṃ saṃghe pariṇatam ātmano pariṇāmeya nissargikapācattikam //
V04prmosulu:83_0: uddiṣṭāḥ kho punar āyuṣmanto triṃśan nissarggikapācattikā dharmmāḥ /
V04prmosulu:83_1_0: tatrāyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ? dvitīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ? tṛtīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto
V04prmosulu:83_1_1: pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ? pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
V04prmosulu:85_0: ime kho punar āyuṣmanto dvānavatiṃ śuddhapācattikā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśam āgacchanti Ō
V04prmosulu:pac.4_0_0: yo puna bhikṣur jānaṃ saṃghasyādhikaraṇāni dharmeṇa vinayena vihitāni vyupaśāntāni punaḥ karmāya utkhoṭeya Ō idaṃ punaḥ karma
V04prmosulu:pac.4_0_1: kartavyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti Ō etad eva pratyayaṃ kṛtvā ananyam imaṃ tasya bhikṣusya utkhoṭanaṃ pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.5_0: yo puna bhikṣur akalpiyakāro mātṛgrāmasya dharmaṃ deśeya uttari cchahi pañcahi vācāhi anyatra vijñapuruṣapudgalena pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.6_0: yo puna bhikṣur anupasaṃpannaṃ pudgalaṃ padaśo dharmaṃ vāceya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.7_0_0: yo puna bhikṣur anupasaṃpannasya pudgalasya santike ātmopanāyikam uttarimanuṣyadharmam alamāryajñānadarśanaṃ viśeṣādhigamaṃ
V04prmosulu:pac.7_0_1: pratijāneya Ō iti jānāmi iti paśyāmīti bhūtasmiṃ pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.8_0: yo puna bhikṣur jānan bhikṣusya duṣṭhullām āpattim anupasaṃpannasya pudgalasya santike āroceya anyatra kṛtāye prakāśanāsaṃmutīye pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.9_0: yo puna bhikṣur jānan sāṃghike lābhe bhājīyamāne pūrve samanujño bhūtvā paścāt kṣiyādharmam āpadyeya Ō yathāsaṃstutam evāyuṣmanto,
V04prmosulu:pac.9_1: jānan sāṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ saṃghe pariṇataṃ pudgalo pudgalasya pariṇāmayatīti pācattikaṃ /

V04prmosulu:pac.10_0_1: uddiṣṭehi yāvad eva bhikṣūṇāṃ kaukṛtyāya vighātāya vilekhāya saṃvartantīti,

V04prmosulu:pac.14_1: na uddharāpeya vā, anāmantrayitvā vā prakrameya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.15_0: yo punar bhikṣuḥ sāṃghike bhikṣuvihāre antośayyāṃ prajñāpetvā prajñāpayitvā vā tato prakramanto na uddhareya vā,
V04prmosulu:pac.15_1: na uddharāpeya vā, anāmantrayitvā vā prakrameya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.16_0: yo punar bhikṣu bhikṣusya duṣṭo doṣāt kupito anāttamano sāṃghikād bhikṣuvihārād bhikṣuṃ nikaḍḍheya vā nikaḍḍhāpeya vā antamasato neha bhikṣū ti vā vadeya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.17_0: yo puna bhikṣu sāṃghike bhikṣuvihāre jānan bhikṣūṇāṃ pūrvaprajñaptāhi śayyāhi paścād āgatvā madhyeśayyāṃ prajñāpeya yasyodvahiṣyati so prakramiṣyatīti /
V04prmosulu:pac.17_1: etad eva pratyayaṃ kṛtvā, ananyam imaṃ tasya bhikṣusya udvāhanapācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.18_0: yo puna bhikṣuḥ sāṃghike bhikṣuvihāre upari vaihāyasakuṭikāye āhatya pādake mañce vā pīṭhe vā abhiniṣīdeya vā abhinipadyeya vā pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.19_0: yo puna bhikṣur jānan saprāṇakenodakena tṛṇaṃ vā mṛttikāṃ vā siñceya vā siñcāpeya vā pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.20_0: mahallakaṃ bhikṣuṇā vihāraṃ chādāpayamānena yāvad dvārakoṣārgalapratiṣṭhānam ālokasandhiparikarmam upādāya dve vā trayo vā cchādanaparyāyā adhiṣṭhihitavyāḥ alpaharite sthitena /
V04prmosulu:pac.20_1: taduttariṃ adhiṣṭhiheya alpaharite sthito pi pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:106_1: (11) bījam (12) anyavādaṃ (13) odhyāyanaṃ (14) mañca (15) śayyā (16) nikaḍḍhanaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.21_0: yo puna bhikṣu asaṃmato bhikṣuṇīm ovadeya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.22_0: saṃmato vāpi bhikṣuḥ bhikṣūṇīm ovadeya vikāle, astaṃgate sūrye, anūhate aruṇe pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.23_0: yo puna bhikṣu ovādaprekṣo bhikṣuṇīupāśrayam upasaṃkrameya santaṃ bhikṣum anāmantrayitvā,
V04prmosulu:pac.23_1: anyatra samaye pācattikaṃ / tatrāyaṃ samayo Ō gilānā bhikṣuṇī ovaditavyā anuśāsitavyā bhavati /
V04prmosulu:pac.24_0: yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣum evaṃ vadeya Ō āmiṣahetor āyuṣman bhikṣu bhikṣuṇīṃ te ovadatīti pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.25_0: yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣuṇīya sārdham eko ekāya raho niṣadyāṃ kalpeya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.26_0: yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣuṇīya sārdhaṃ saṃvidhāya adhvānamārgaṃ pratipadyeya antamasato grāmāntaraṃ pi,
V04prmosulu:pac.26_1: anyatra samaye, pācattikaṃ / tatrāyaṃ samayo Ō mārgo bhavati sabhayo sapratibhayo sāśaṃkasaṃmato /
V04prmosulu:pac.27_0: yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣuṇīya sārdhaṃ saṃvidhāya ekanāvāṃ abhiruheya ūrdhvagāminīṃ vā adhogāminīṃ vā,
V04prmosulu:pac.28_0: yo puna bhikṣu anyātikāye bhikṣuṇīye cīvaraṃ dadyād anyatra pallaṭṭhakena pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.29_0: yo puna bhikṣur anyātikāye bhikṣuṇīye cīvaraṃ sīveya vā sīvāpeya vā pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.30_0: yo puna bhikṣur jānan bhikṣuṇīparipācitaṃ pinḍapātaṃ paribhuñjeya,
V04prmosulu:117_1: (21) asaṃmato (22) saṃmato cāpi (23) ovādo (24) āmiṣaṃ (25) niṣadyā ca /
V04prmosulu:117_2: (26) adhvānamārgo (27) nāvā ca (28) deti (29) sīveti (30) paripācanena /
V04prmosulu:pac.33_0: yo puna bhikṣur bhuṃjāvī pravārito utthito āsanāto,
V04prmosulu:pac.33_1: anatiriktaṃ kṛtaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādeya vā bhuṃjeya vā pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.34_0: yo puna bhikṣur jānan bhikṣu bhuktāvī pravāritam utthitam āsanāto āsādanāprekṣo anatiriktakṛtena khādanīyena vā bhojanīyena vā upanimantreya,
V04prmosulu:pac.34_1: ehi bhikṣu khādāhi bhuṃjāhīti vā vadeya bhuktasmiṃ pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.35_0: yo puna bhikṣur adinnam apratigrāhitaṃ mukhadvārikam āhāram āhāreya anyatrodakadantapoṇe pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.38_0: bhikṣuṃ kho punaḥ kulehi upasaṃkrāntaṃ pravāreṃsu pūpehi vā manthehi vā /
V04prmosulu:pac.38_3: bahirdhā nīharitvā agilānakehi bhikṣūhi sārdhaṃ saṃvibhajitvā khāditavyaṃ bhuṃjitavyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.38_4: taduttariṃ pratigṛhṇitvā bahirdhā nīharitvā agilānakehi bhikṣūhi sārdhaṃ saṃvibhajitvā vā asaṃvibhajitvā vā khādeya vā bhuṃjeya vā pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.39_0_0: yāni kho punar imāni praṇītasaṃmatāni bhojanāni bhavanti saṃyyathīdaṃ sarpistailaṃ madhu phāṇitaṃ dugdhaṃ dadhi matsyaṃ māṃsaṃ
V04prmosulu:pac.39_0_1: yo puna bhikṣur evaṃrūpāṇi praṇītasaṃmatāni bhojanāni ātmārthāya agilāno kulehi vijñapetvā vā vijñāpāyetvā vā khādeya vā
V04prmosulu:pac.40_1: tatrāyaṃ samayo Ō gilānasamayo cīvaradānakālasamayo adhvānagamanasamayo nāvābhirohaṇasamayo mahāsamayo śravaṇabhaktaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.41_0: yo puna bhikṣur ātmārthāya agilāno jyotismiṃ vitāpanāprekṣo tṛṇaṃ vā kāṣṭhaṃ vā gomayaṃ vā sakalikāṃ vā tuṣaṃ vā saṃkāraṃ vā ādaheya vā ādahāpeya vā anyatra samaye pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.42_0: yo puna bhikṣur anupasaṃpannena pudgalena sārdhaṃ uttari dvirātraṃ trirātraṃ vā sahagāraśayyāṃ kalpeya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.43_0: yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣūṇāṃ karmaṇā cchandaṃ datvā paścād duṣṭo doṣāt kupito anāttamano evaṃ vadeya Ō adinno me chando,
V04prmosulu:pac.43_1: durdinno me chando, akṛtāny etāni karmāṇi duṣkṛtāny etāni karmāṇi,
V04prmosulu:pac.43_2: nāham eteṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ cchandaṃ demīti vadeya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.44_0: yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣum evaṃ vadeya Ō ehi tvam āyuṣman grāmaṃ pinḍāya praviśiṣyāmaḥ /
V04prmosulu:pac.44_1: ahaṃ ca te tatra kiṃcid dāpayiṣyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.44_2: so tatra tasya kiñcid dāpayitvā vā adāpayitvā vā paścād udyojanaprekṣo evaṃ vadeya Ō gaccha tvam āyuṣman na me tvayā sārdhaṃ phāsu bhavati kathāya vā niṣadyāya vā,
V04prmosulu:pac.44_3: ekasyaiva mama phāsu bhavati kathāya vā niṣadyāya vā /
V04prmosulu:pac.45_0: yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣūn evaṃ vadeya /
V04prmosulu:pac.45_1: tathāham āyuṣmanto bhagavatā dharmaṃ deśitam ājānāmi yathā ye ime antarāyikā dharmā uktā bhagavatā tān pratisevato nālam antarāyāya /
V04prmosulu:pac.45_2: so bhikṣu bhikṣūhi evam asya vacanīyo Ō mā āyuṣmann evaṃ vada,
V04prmosulu:pac.45_4: antarāyikā evāyuṣman dharmāḥ samānā antarāyikā dharmā uktā bhagavatā,
V04prmosulu:pac.45_5: alaṃ ca punas tān pratiṣevato antarāyāya /
V04prmosulu:pac.45_6: evaṃ ca so bhikṣu bhikṣūhi vucyamāno taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.45_7: no ca pratinissareya so bhikṣu bhikṣūhi yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyo samanubhāṣitavyo tasya vastusya pratinissargāya /
V04prmosulu:pac.45_8: yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇo vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇo vā taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.45_9: no ca pratinissareya so bhikṣuḥ samagreṇa saṃghena utkṣipitavyo /
V04prmosulu:pac.46_0_0: yo puna bhikṣur jānan bhikṣuṃ tathā utkṣiptaṃ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmeṇa vinayena yathāvādiṃ tathākāriṃ tāṃ pāpikāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ
V04prmosulu:pac.46_0_1: apratinissarantaṃ akṛtānudharmaṃ saṃbhuñjeya vā saṃvaseya vā sahagāraśayyāṃ vā kalpeya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.47_0: śramaṇuddeso pi ced evaṃ vadeya tathāham āyuṣmanto bhagavatā dharmaṃ deśitam ājānāmi yathā ye ime antarāyikā kāmā uktā bhagavatā tān pratisevato nālam antarāyāya /
V04prmosulu:pac.47_1: so śramaṇuddeśo bhikṣūhi evam asya vacanīyo Ō mā āyuṣman cchramaṇuddeśa evaṃ vada,
V04prmosulu:pac.47_3: antarāyikā evāyuṣman cchramaṇuddeśa kāmāḥ samānā antarāyikāḥ kāmā uktā bhagavatā /
V04prmosulu:pac.47_4: alaṃ ca punas tān pratisevato antarāyāya /
V04prmosulu:pac.47_5: evaṃ ca so śramaṇuddeśo bhikṣūhi vucyamāno taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.47_6_0: no ca pratinissareya so śramaṇuddeśo bhikṣūhi yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyo samanubhāṣitavyo tasya vastusya pratinissargāya
V04prmosulu:pac.47_6_1: yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇo vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇo vā taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ,
V04prmosulu:pac.47_7: no ca pratinissareya so śramaṇuddeśo bhikṣūhi nāśayitavyo Ō adyadagreṇa te āyuṣman śramaṇuddeśa na caiva so bhagavāṃs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho śāstā vyapadiśitavyo /
V04prmosulu:pac.47_8: yaṃ pi ca dāni labhasi bhikṣūhi sārdhaṃ dvirātraṃ vā trirātraṃ vā sahagāraśayyāṃ sāpi te adyadagreṇa nāsti /
V04prmosulu:pac.47_10_0: yo puna bhikṣur jānan tathānāśitaṃ śramaṇuddeśaṃ yathāvādīṃ tathākāriṃ tāṃ pāpikāṃ dṛṣṭim apratinissarantaṃ akṛtānudharmaṃ
V04prmosulu:pac.47_10_1: upasthāpeya vā upalāpeya vā saṃbhuṃjeya vā saṃvaseya vā sahagāraśayyāṃ vā kalpeya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.48_0: navacīvaralābhinā bhikṣuṇā trayāṇāṃ durvarṇīkaraṇānām anyatarānyataraṃ durvaṇīkaraṇam ādayitavyaṃ Ō nīlaṃ vā kardamaṃ vā kālaśyāmaṃ vā /
V04prmosulu:pac.48_1: tato ca bhikṣur anādāya navaṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuṃjeya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.49_0: yo puna bhikṣur anyatra adhyārāme vā adhyāvasathe vā ratanaṃ vā ratanasaṃmataṃ vā udgṛhṇeya vā udgṛhṇāpeya vā,
V04prmosulu:pac.49_1: pācattikaṃ / ākāṃkṣamāṇena bhikṣuṇā ratanaṃ vā ratanasaṃmataṃ vā adhyārāme vā adhyāvasathe vā udgṛhṇitavyaṃ vā udgṛhṇāpayitavyaṃ vā Ō yasya bhaviṣyati so hariṣyatīti /
V04prmosulu:pac.50_1: anyatra samaye pācattikaṃ / tatrāyaṃ samayo Ō dvyardho māso śeṣo grīṣmāṇāṃ,
V04prmosulu:pac.50_2: varṣāṇāṃ ca purimo māso ity ete aḍḍhātīyamāsāḥ,

V04prmosulu:pac.54_0: yo puna bhikṣur jānan saṃbhojanīye kule praticchannāsane niṣadyāṃ kalpeya pācattikaṃ /

V04prmosulu:pac.58_0: yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣuṃ prahareya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.59_0: yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣusya talaśaktikām āvarjeya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.60_0: yo puna bhikṣur jānan bhikṣusya duṣṭhullām āpattiṃ kṛtām adhyācīrṇāṃ cchādeya,
V04prmosulu:pac.60_1: so na pareṣām āroceya kiṃ ti se mā pare jānantū ti /

V04prmosulu:pac.62_0: yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣusya saṃcintya kaukṛtyam upasaṃhareya kiṃ ti se muhūrtaṃ pi aphāsu bhavatū ti pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.63_0: yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣusya vā bhikṣuṇīye vā śrāmaṇerasya vā śrāmaṇerīye vā śikṣamāṇāye vā cīvaraṃ datvā apratyuddhareya paribhuṃjeya,
V04prmosulu:pac.64_0: yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣusya pātraṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā niṣīdanaṃ vā sūcīvigrahaṃ vā apaniheya vā apanihāpeya vā antamaśato hāsyārthaṃ pi pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.65_0: yo puna bhikṣur bhikṣuṃ bhīṣeya pācattikam /
V04prmosulu:pac.68_0: yo puna bhikṣu mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdhaṃ saṃvidhāya adhvānamārgaṃ pratipadyeya antamaśato grāmāntaraṃ pi pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.69_0: yo puna bhikṣu mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdhaṃ sahagāraśayyāṃ kalpeya pācattikaṃ /

V04prmosulu:pac.71_1: so ca pudgalo anupasaṃpanno, te ca bhikṣū gārhyāṃ, imaṃ teṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ garhaṇapācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.72_0: yo puna bhikṣur jānan stainyasārthena sārdhaṃ saṃvidhāya adhvānamārgaṃ pratipadyeya antamaśato grāmāntaraṃ pi pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.73_0: yo puna bhikṣuḥ svahastaṃ pṛthivīṃ khaneya vā khanāpeya vā antamaśato iha khanehīti vā vadeya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.74_1: taduttariṃ sādiyeya, anyatra punaḥ pravāraṇe, anyatra yāvajjīvikāye pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.75_0: yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣūhi evaṃ vucyamāno Ō imehi te āyuṣman pañcahi āpattikāyehi anadhyāvācāya śikṣā karaṇīyeti,
V04prmosulu:pac.75_1_0: so bhikṣu tān bhikṣūn evaṃ vadeya Ō na yāvad aham āyuṣmantānāṃ vacanena śikṣiṣyaṃ yāvad ahaṃ na drakṣyāmi sthavirān bhikṣūn
V04prmosulu:pac.75_1_1: sūtradharān vinayadharān mātṛkādharān madhyamān bhikṣūn sūtradharān vinayadharān mātṛkādharān,
V04prmosulu:pac.75_3: tāṃs tāvad aham upasaṃkramya paripṛcchiṣyaṃ paripraśnīkariṣyaṃ ti,
V04prmosulu:pac.75_4: pācattikaṃ / śikṣākāmena bhikṣuṇā ājñātavyam upalakṣayitavyaṃ upadhārayitavyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.78_0: yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣūhi kalahajātehi bhaṇḍanajātehi vigrahavivādāpannehi viharantehi upaśrotrasthāne tiṣṭheya Ō yaṃ ete vadiṣyanti taṃ paścād upasaṃhariṣyāmīti /
V04prmosulu:pac.78_1: etad eva pratyayaṃ kṛtvā, ananyam, imaṃ tasya bhikṣusya upaśrotrasthāne pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.79_0: yo puna bhikṣuḥ saṃghe viniścayakathāhi vartamānāhi utthāyāsanāt prakrameya santaṃ bhikṣum anāmantrayitvā,
V04prmosulu:pac.80_0: yo puna bhikṣu āraṇyake śayyāsane viharanto vikāle grāmaṃ praviśeya santaṃ bhikṣum anāmantrayitvā,
V04prmosulu:172_1: (71) ūnaviṃśati (72) stainyasārtho (73) pṛthivī (74) pravāraṇā (75) na śikṣiṣyaṃ (76) madyapānam (77) anādaryam (78) upaśrotra (79) viniścaya (80) āraṇyakena /
V04prmosulu:pac.81_0: yo puna bhikṣu sabhakto samāno purebhaktaṃ paścādbhaktaṃ vā kuleṣu cāritram āpadyeya santaṃ bhikṣum anāmantrayitvā,
V04prmosulu:pac.81_1: anyatra samaye pācattikaṃ / tatrāyam samayo Ō cīvaradānakālasamayo /
V04prmosulu:pac.82_0: yo puna bhikṣu rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya janapadasthāmavīryaprāptasya antaḥpuraṃ praviśeyāniṣkrānte rājāne,
V04prmosulu:pac.82_1: aniṣkrānte antaḥpure, anirgatehi ratanehi antamaśato indrakīlaṃ pi atikrameya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.83_0: yo puna bhikṣu dantamayaṃ vā asthimayaṃ vā śṛṅgamayaṃ vā suvarṇamayaṃ vā rūpyamayaṃ vā ratanamayaṃ vā sūcīvigrahaṃ kārāpeya bhedanapācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.84_0: mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā bhikṣuṇā kārāpayamāṇena sugatāṣṭāṅgulapramāṇāḥ pādakāḥ kārāpayitavyāḥ anyatrāṭṭanīye,
V04prmosulu:pac.85_0: yo puna bhikṣuḥ tūlasaṃstṛte mañce vā pīṭhe vā abhiniṣīdeya vā abhi[ni]padyeya vā uddālanapācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.86_1: tatredaṃ pramāṇaṃ Ō dīrghaśo dve vitastīyo sugatavitastinā tiryag dvyardham anyatra daśavitastikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.87_1: tatredaṃ pramāṇaṃ Ō dīrghaśo catvāri vitastīyo sugatavitastinā,
V04prmosulu:pac.88_1: tatredaṃ pramāṇaṃ Ō dīrghaśo ṣaḍvitastīyo sugatavitastinā,
V04prmosulu:pac.89_0_0: yo puna bhikṣuḥ sugatacīvarapramāṇaṃ cīvaraṃ kārāpeya Ō kiñca tasya bhagavato tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sugatasya
V04prmosulu:pac.89_1: tiryak ṣaṭ / idaṃ tasya bhagavato tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sugatasya sugatacīvarapramāṇaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.89_2: tato vā punar uttariṃ kārāpeya cchedanapācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.90_0: yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣusya duṣṭo doṣāt kupito anāttamano amūlakena saṃghātiśeṣeṇa dharmeṇānudhvaṃseya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.91_0: yo puna bhikṣur jānan sāṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ saṃghe pariṇataṃ pudgalo pudgalasya pariṇāmeya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:pac.92_0: yo puna bhikṣur anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddiśyamāne evaṃ vadeya Ō adya punar ahaṃ jānāmi,
V04prmosulu:pac.92_1: idānīṃ punar ahaṃ jānāmi Ō ayaṃ pi dharmo sūtrāgato sūtraparyāpanno anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśam āgacchati /
V04prmosulu:pac.92_2: yāvad ahaṃ na jānāmi tāvan nāstītthaṃ mahyam āpattir jāneṃsu ca te bhikṣu taṃ bhikṣuṃ sakṛd dvikkhuto trikkhuto āgatapūrvaṃ pi sanniṣaṇṇapūrvaṃ pi,
V04prmosulu:pac.92_3: kaḥ punar vādo bahuśo / nāsti kho punas tasya bhikṣusya ajñānena muktiḥ /
V04prmosulu:pac.92_4: atha khu yāṃ pi ca so bhikṣur āpattim āpanno tāṃ kṣipram eva yathādharmmaṃ yathāvinayaṃ kārāpayitavyo,
V04prmosulu:pac.92_6: tasya te āyuṣman lābhā durlabdhā yas tvaṃ anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddiśyamāne nāsthīkṛtvā na manasikṛtvā na sarvacetasā samanvāhṛtya avahitaśroto satkṛtya dharmaṃ śṛṇoṣīti /

V04prmosulu:187_0: uddiṣṭāḥ kho punar āyuṣmanto dvānavati śuddhapācattikā dharmāḥ /
V04prmosulu:187_1_0: tatrāyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ? dvitīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ? tṛtīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto
V04prmosulu:187_1_1: pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ? pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
V04prmosulu:189_0: ime kho punar āyuṣmanto catvāraḥ prātideśanikā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśam āgacchanti Ō
V04prmosulu:pratid.1_0: yo puna bhikṣu āraṇyake śayanāsane viharanto pūrve apratisaṃveditaṃ bahirdhā apratigṛhītaṃ,
V04prmosulu:pratid.1_1_0: antovāsavastusminn agilāno svahastaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā pratigṛhṇitvā khādeya vā bhuñjeya vā bhuktāvinā tena bhikṣuṇā
V04prmosulu:pratid.1_1_1: pratideśayitavyaṃ Ō asaṃpreyaṃ me āyuṣman gārhyaṃ prātideśanikaṃ dharmam āpanno /
V04prmosulu:pratid.2_0_0: yo puna bhikṣur anyātikāye bhikṣuṇīye antaragṛhaṃ praviṣṭāye agilāno svahastaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā pratigṛhṇitvā
V04prmosulu:pratid.2_0_1: khādeya vā bhuṃjeya vā bhuktāvinā tena bhikṣuṇā pratideśayitavyaṃ Ō asaṃpreyaṃ me āyuṣman gārhyaṃ prātideśanikaṃ dharmam
V04prmosulu:pratid.2_1: taṃ dharmmaṃ pratideśayāmi / ayaṃ pi dharmo prātideśaniko /
V04prmosulu:pratid.3_0: bhikṣu kho punar antaragṛhe nimantritakā bhuñjanti /
V04prmosulu:pratid.3_1: tatra ca bhikṣuṇī viśvāsamānarūpā sthitā bhavati /
V04prmosulu:pratid.3_2: sā evam āha Ō iha odanaṃ dehi,
V04prmosulu:pratid.3_3: iha sūpaṃ dehi, iha vyañjanaṃ dehīti vā vadeya /
V04prmosulu:pratid.3_4: sarvehi tehi bhikṣuhi sā bhikṣuṇī evam asya vacanīyā Ō āgamaya tāva tvaṃ bhagini yāvad bhikṣū bhuñjantīti /
V04prmosulu:pratid.3_5: ekabhikṣū pi ca tāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ neva vadeya Ō āgamaya tāva tvaṃ bhagini yāvad bhikṣū bhuñjantīti,
V04prmosulu:pratid.3_6: bhuktāvīhi tehi bhikṣūhi pratideśayitavyaṃ Ō asaṃpreyaṃ me āyuṣman gārhyaṃ prātideśanikaṃ dharmam āpanno /
V04prmosulu:pratid.3_7: taṃ dharmaṃ pratideśayāmi / ayaṃ pi dharmo prātideśaniko /
V04prmosulu:pratid.4_0_0: yāni kho punar imāni śaikṣasaṃmatāni kulāni bhavanti tatra ca bhikṣuḥ pūrve apravārito upasaṃkramitvā svahastaṃ khādanīyaṃ
V04prmosulu:pratid.4_0_1: vā bhojanīyaṃ vā pratigṛhṇitvā khādeya vā bhuñjeya vā bhuktāvinā tena bhikṣuṇā pratideśayitavyaṃ Ō asaṃpreyaṃ me āyuṣman
V04prmosulu:pratid.4_1: taṃ dharmaṃ pratideśayāmi / ayaṃ pi dharmo prātideśaniko /
